requirements.summary: Create Withdrawal page with amount selection buttons (₹100, ₹200, ₹500, ₹1000) using dark navy/gold theme with visual selection state
acceptanceCriteria: A Withdrawal page exists at frontend/src/pages/Withdrawal.tsx
Tapping a button highlights it as selected
Only one amount can be selected at a time
Page uses the existing dark navy/gold color scheme

file_operations.description: Create a new Withdrawal page component that displays four withdrawal amount buttons (₹100, ₹200, ₹500, ₹1000). Implement React state to track the selected amount, ensuring only one button can be selected at a time. Apply the existing dark navy/gold theme using Tailwind classes consistent with the project's design system (navy-900 background, gold-500 accents). Add visual highlighting for the selected button using gold border and background effects. Include a page header matching the style of other pages in the app.

requirements.summary: Add navigation to Withdrawal page from Account page and register the route in App.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate to the Withdrawal page from within the app
The route for the Withdrawal page is registered in App.tsx

file_operations.description: Import the Withdrawal component and register a new route '/withdrawal' in the routing configuration. Add the route alongside existing routes like '/payment', '/game', etc. Ensure the route is protected behind authentication similar to other user-specific pages.

Add a 'Withdraw' button in the Account page UI that navigates to the '/withdrawal' route. Position it near the wallet balance display or alongside the existing account action buttons. Style it consistently with the existing button design using the gold/navy theme. Use React Router's useNavigate hook to handle navigation.
